title: Modelled unemployment rate aged 16 years and over

versions.title: Modelled unemployment rate aged 16 years and over
versions.summary: Modelled unemployment rate for people aged 16 years and over, Great Britain, 07/2004-06/2005 to 07/2022-06/2023.
versions.description: This dataset shows modelled-based estimates for the proportion of people aged 16 years and over without a job who have been actively seeking work within the last four weeks and are available to start work within the next two weeks
